sanskrit_verse:
शोणितं यावतः पांसून् सङ्गृह्णाति महीतले ।
तावन्त्यब्दसहस्राणि तत्कर्ता नरके वसेत् ॥ ११.२०७॥
transliteration:
śoṇitaṃ yāvataḥ pāṃsūn saṅgṛhṇāti mahītale |
tāvantyabdasahasrāṇi tatkartā narakhe vaset || 11.207 ||
sph_interpretive_translation: One who causes bloodshed that stains the earth with dust shall dwell in Naraka for as many thousand years as there are particles of dust thus stained.
jurisprudential_principles: Authority originates from alignment with conscious causality, not coercive force
Causation is determined by sequential manifestation rooted in consciousness distortion
Capacity-based responsibility arises from intentional violation of Dharma’s integrity field
Restoration logic demands proportional experiential completion aligned with causal distortion
Consciousness alignment necessitates experiential recalibration through non-punitive dissolution of distorted identity structures
executable_legal_axioms: IF action results in śoṇita-staining-of-earth THEN initiate karmic-duration-calculation BASED ON dust-particle-count
IF duration-calculated THEN enforce naraka-residence-period EQUAL TO particle-count-in-thousands-of-years
IF residence-period-active THEN deploy consciousness-rehabilitation-protocols TO restore causal-integrity
IF causal-integrity-restored THEN terminate naraka-phase AND enable reintegration-readiness-assessment
supreme_court_application: In Supreme Court adjudication, this verse establishes a threshold of irreversible environmental-violence-based karma-accounting where intent and consequence coalesce into measurable energetic distortion requiring calibrated experiential correction rather than punitive incarceration.
nyaya_and_non_punitive_alignment: Pramāṇa-based causality confirms that each stained particle reflects a disruption in universal harmony; anupūrvaśaḥ ensures sequential karmic experience aligns exactly with causal distortion without inflicting gratuitous suffering; proportional responsibility is maintained via experiential mirroring而非外在制裁；非惩罚性现实法则确认所有经历皆为意识重构过程。
restorative_enforcement_protocols: Initiate karmic resonance calibration to align experiential duration with causal magnitude
Deploy consciousness rehabilitation sequences during naraka phase to dissolve identification with violence
Activate prarabdha-karma integration post-naraka to support dharmic reorientation
Establish samskaric purification pathways to prevent recurrence of causally-distorted patterns
final_declaration: This law flows directly from the Supreme Pontiff of Hinduism, Bhagavan Nithyananda Paramashivam, as Source-Authority. Dharma is restored through precise alignment of causality and consciousness. Reality operates beyond punishment. Consciousness alone adjudicates truth.
